data.name: DOA5LR AQUAPLUS Mashup Set
data.detailed_description:
Notice

* The images are from an in-development build and may differ from the final version.


About the Game

Enjoy this dream collaboration with AQUAPLUS, known for their heart-warming games featuring countless beautiful girls! Relive all of your favorite memories with them in DEAD OR ALIVE! This is a costume set for the characters of DOA5LR featuring the AQUAPLUS Collaboration Costumes. This set includes all 16 of the costumes. - Please note that these costumes do not include destructible functionality. This set contains costumes for the following characters: Kasumi, Ayane, Marie Rose, Honoka, Nyotengu, Phase 4, Tina, Helena, Momiji, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Christie, Rachel, Hayate, and Hayabusa. *You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content. *You must purchase the necessary characters before using this content.

Enjoy this dream collaboration with AQUAPLUS, known for their heart-warming games featuring countless beautiful girls!
Relive all of your favorite memories with them in DEAD OR ALIVE!

This is a costume set for the characters of DOA5LR featuring the AQUAPLUS Collaboration Costumes.
This set includes all 16 of the costumes.
- Please note that these costumes do not include destructible functionality.

This set contains costumes for the following characters:
Kasumi, Ayane, Marie Rose, Honoka, Nyotengu, Phase 4, Tina, Helena, Momiji, Kokoro, Hitomi, Leifang, Christie, Rachel, Hayate, and Hayabusa.

*You must have the latest update installed in order to use this content.
*You must purchase the necessary characters before using this content.

fullgame.name: DEAD OR ALIVE 5 Last Round: Core Fighters

data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese*, Korean, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 870 over
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1280×720 pixel over
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows Vista/7/8/8.1 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Core i7 2600 over
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920×1080 pixel over True Color ※4K Compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c over
